headline: Ask HN: How should I design flexible domain model
description: I want to build a domain model where the model elements/fields' relationship depends on categories of requests. Let me explain: If requests are from CompanyA then Order Title is same as the line items, and the line item names are parameters. Also depending on the type of Title category, the average cost of items are weighted differently. *Any questions/pointers is greatly appreciated*
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 我应该如何设计灵活的领域模型
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 我應該如何設計靈活的領域模型
description_zh-Hans: 我想建立一个领域模型，模型元素/字段的关系取决于请求的类别。让我解释一下。如果请求来自 CompanyA，那么订单标题与行项目相同，而行项目名称是参数。Also depending on the type of Title category, the average cost of items are weighted differently. *Any questions/pointers is greatly appreciated*
description_zh-Hant: 我想建立一個領域模型，模型元素/字段的關係取決於請求的類別。讓我解釋一下。如果請求來自 CompanyA，那麼訂單標題與行項目相同，而行項目名稱是參數。Also depending on the type of Title category, the average cost of items are weighted differently. *Any questions/pointers is greatly appreciated*
